algorithm_technique: Iterating through diagonals and using sets for distinct counts
problem_summary_simple: For each cell, find the difference in distinct values on its top-left and bottom-right diagonals.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through all diagonals. For each cell, count distinct elements in the top-left diagonal and bottom-right diagonal using sets.
key_insights: The problem involves processing diagonals of the grid.
For each cell (r, c), the top-left diagonal consists of cells (r-k, c-k) and the bottom-right diagonal consists of cells (r+k, c+k).
Using sets is efficient for counting distinct elements along these diagonals.
